subsection.name: What is it?
subsection.p: In regular jsp site development, the browser goes to a jsp by means of the URL and the page retrieves the repository content and presents it. The HST2's URL mapping functionality reverses this process: the URL configured in the HST2, describes the location of the repository content and determines it's view.
For example, a content URL showing a news item would look like /myapp/news/new-version-released, whereas a page URL with parameters would look like /myapp/news/newsItem.jsp?item=1.
Having content URL instead of page URL has the benefits of being readable and bookmarkable.
